short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helpful plugin for the web browser version of the Flyff Universe to cast spells from another tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
extension raises the quality of gameplay in two tabs (main char and rm) to a newer lever where all needed spells can be caster from the main char tab without switching.

This is not a bot application! It's impossible to detect the usage of such a plugin so you are totally safe using it.

For more information and know-how go to the GitHub webpage:
https://github.com/pPrecel/flyff-universe-multi-tab-spell-caster?tab=readme-ov-file#usage
